text.content: If I could have my wasted days back  Would I use them to get back on track?
Stop to warm at karmas burning  Or look ahead, but keep on turning?
Do I have the strength  To know how I'll go?
Can I find it inside  To deal with what I shouldn't know?
Could I have my wasted days back  Would I use them to get back on track?
You live it or lie it!

My lifestyle determines my deathstyle    Keep searching, keep on searching  This search goes on, this search goes on    Frantic tick tick tick tick tick tick tock  Frantic tick tick tick tick tick tick tock    I've worn out always being afraid  An endless stream of fear that I've made  Treading water full of worry  This frantic tick tick talk of hurry    Do I have the strength  To know how I'll go?
Can I find it inside  To deal with what I shouldn't know    Worn out always being afraid  An endless stream of fear that I've made    You live it or lie it!

My lifestyle determines my deathstyle    Keep searching, keep on searching  This search goes on, this search goes on    Frantic tick tick tick tick tick tick tock  Frantic tick tick tick tick tick tick tock    My lifestyle (Birth is pain)  Determines by deathstyle (Life is pain)  A rising tide (Death is pain)  That pushes to the other side (It's all the same)
